# rapid

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Convert an 'API' document ('APID'), such as one that follows the 'OpenAPI Specification', to an R object.

## Installation

You can install the development version of rapid from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jonthegeek/rapid")
```
